skillTree.localised_description: The power to move objects without touching them makes missiles attacks against this one largely pointless.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%

Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +10

skillTree.localised_description: Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -15
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: All shall be one, as it is written.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +20
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through millennia of study, total mastery over magic may be attained.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.
Cold, merciless, without pity, obeying only logic. Hardened against magic's ill-effects.
Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection â€“ a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

skillTree.localised_description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: So powerful is their affinity with the Winds that even a fourth generation spawning produces Slann with impressive spellcasting abilities.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +30
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Spawned via sacred rites, third generation Slann are adept at controlling the Winds of Magic to the Lizardmen's advantage.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +40
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Slann of this spawning generation are powerful magic-users able to command the Winds of Magic to their will.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +20
